tasks.task: Setting up an automatic gardening system with a valve pack, water intake, flow rate sensor, and Raspberry Pi controller.
subtasks: Assembling the valve pack and connecting it to the irrigation zones.
Installing the house water selector valve and intake for the tank.
Configuring the flow rate sensor to monitor water usage.
Setting up the Raspberry Pi controller with a web interface for system monitoring.
Integrating a rain delay mechanism to prevent watering during precipitation.
Implementing an interrupt system to track water flow rates and update the interface every five seconds.
Developing a user interface to control and monitor the irrigation system's status.
Configuring the system to prevent sensor activation during rain delays.
Enhancing the system's functionality by adding external API integration for environmental sensors.
Setting up alarms for potential issues like valve malfunctions or leaks.
